results.title: Risk factors for stroke and type of stroke in persons with isolated systolic hypertension. Systolic Hypertension in the Elderly Program Cooperative Research Group.
results.text_hl: One treatment group received @CHEMICAL_Chlorthalidone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002752 @@@chlorthalidone@@@ (12.5 to 25 mg/d) with step-up to @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (25.0 to 50.0 mg/d) or @CHEMICAL_Reserpine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012110 @@@reserpine@@@ (0.05 to 0.10 mg/d), if needed.

citations.NLM: Davis BR, Vogt T, Frost PH, Burlando A, Cohen J, Wilson A, Brass LM, Frishman W, Price T, Stamler J. Risk factors for stroke and type of stroke in persons with isolated systolic hypertension. Systolic Hypertension in the Elderly Program Cooperative Research Group. Stroke. 1998 Jul;29(7):1333-40. PMID: 9660383
